blogPost.excerpt: Collaborate through all phases of the product development process in Kitemaker and keep track of work across Slack, Discord, Figma, and Github. It's still super-fast and has even more hotkeys.
blogPost.body: Collaborate through all phases of the product development process in Kitemaker and keep track of work across Slack, Discord, Figma, and Github. It's still super-fast and has even more hotkeys.
blogPost.title: Kitemaker - A fast tool for product collaboration and discussions
blogPost.author: Sean Percival

localize.description: 在Kitemaker中协作完成产品开发过程的所有阶段，并通过Slack、Discord、Figma和Github跟踪工作。它的速度还是超快的，而且有更多的热键。
localize.tagline: 产品协作和讨论的快速工具

localize.description: 在Kitemaker中協作完成產品開發過程的所有階段，並通過Slack、Discord、Figma和Github跟蹤工作。它的速度還是超快的，而且有更多的熱鍵。
localize.tagline: 產品協作和討論的快速工具

previous.excerpt: Tech Out Loud is Process Street’s new weekly podcast. We find the best articles from the biggest names in tech and read them to you, out loud. Absorb timeless articles from the greatest minds while on the go, at the gym, or just chilling out.
previous.title: Tech Out Loud - The best articles from top minds in tech direct to your ears

localize.description: Tech Out Loud是Process Street的全新周播节目。我们从科技界的大人物那里找到最好的文章，并大声读给你听。在旅途中，在健身房，或者只是放松的时候，吸收最伟大的思想家的永恒文章。
localize.tagline: 来自科技界顶尖人士的最佳文章直接送到您的耳边。

localize.description: Tech Out Loud是Process Street的全新周播節目。我們從科技界的大人物那裏找到最好的文章，並大聲讀給你聽。在旅途中，在健身房，或者只是放鬆的時候，吸收最偉大的思想家的永恆文章。
localize.tagline: 來自科技界頂尖人士的最佳文章直接送到您的耳邊。

next.excerpt: The Unsplash app is home to over 2.5 million free high-resolution images brought to you by the world’s most generous community of photographers. Find the perfect image, collect your favorite, view your stats and more!
next.title: Unsplash for iOS 2.0 - Internet’s source of freely-usable images on your phone

localize.description: Unsplash应用程序是世界上最慷慨的摄影师社区为您带来的超过250万张免费高分辨率图片的家园。寻找完美的图片，收集你最喜欢的图片，查看你的统计资料等等。
localize.tagline: 互联网上免费使用的图片资源在您的手机上。

localize.description: Unsplash應用程序是世界上最慷慨的攝影師社區爲您帶來的超過250萬張免費高分辨率圖片的家園。尋找完美的圖片，收集你最喜歡的圖片，查看你的統計資料等等。
localize.tagline: 互聯網上免費使用的圖片資源在您的手機上。
